short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best Time Search is a free extension that allows to configure your Default Search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best Time Search is a top-notch functional tool that provides an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing. You can easily browse through our user-friendly extension to configure your Default Search to Best Time Search.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Best Time Search" Chrome extension and hereby agree to change default search to Best Time Search provided by the service, and I agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

How to use:
Type search term into the Google Chrome Omnibox. The Best Time Search will provide excellent custom search results powered by Bing.
For more technical details you can read about Google Chrome API for Google Chrome Extensions.

You may remove this extension at any time from the chrome extension page.

Visit our website at https://besttimesearch.com/
Read more about us: https://besttimesearch.com/about/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://besttimesearch.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://besttimesearch.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://besttimesearch.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
